GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Constituent Type Ind Org Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Change Constituent Type from Org to Ind or Ind to Org or HH to Ind with different name options
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Constituent Type Ind Org Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_CONST_TYPE_IND_ORG ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @ACTIONTYPE int = null, @NAMES int = null ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
DECLARE @ADDEDBYID varchar(50) SET @ADDEDBYID = @changeagentid
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
if @ACTIONTYPE = 1 --Individual to org begin -- Ind to Org Name if @NAMES = 2 -- First Last -> Last begin update constituent set keyname = ltrim(rtrim( ltrim(rtrim(firstname)) + ' ' + ltrim(rtrim(keyname)) )), firstname='' where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) end
if @NAMES = 3 -- Last First -> Last begin update constituent set keyname = ltrim(rtrim( ltrim(rtrim(keyname)) + ' ' + ltrim(rtrim(firstname)) )), firstname='' where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) end
if @NAMES = 4 -- Remove First, Keep Last begin update constituent set firstname='' where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) end
if @NAMES = 5 --Title First Last -> Last, Remove Title/First begin update constituent set keyname = ltrim(rtrim( dbo.UFN_TITLECODE_GETDESCRIPTION(titlecodeid) + ' ' + ltrim(rtrim(firstname)) + ' ' + ltrim(rtrim(keyname)) )), firstname='', titlecodeid=null where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) end
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@rowcount
-- Ind to Org Flag update dbo.CONSTITUENT set ISORGANIZATION = 1 where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
--remove name formats delete from nameformat where constituentid in (select id from @constituentselection) --
end
if @ACTIONTYPE = 2 --Org to Individual begin -- Org to Ind Flag
--Delet Organization Data for Org records in selection DELETE FROM dbo.ORGANIZATIONDATA where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
set @NUMBERDELETED = @@rowcount
update dbo.CONSTITUENT set ISORGANIZATION = 0 where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@rowcount end
if @ACTIONTYPE = 3 --HH to Individual begin -- HH to Ind Flag update dbo.CONSTITUENT set ISGROUP = 0 where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@rowcount
delete from groupdata where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
delete from dissolvedgroup where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) end
if @ACTIONTYPE = 4 --Individual to HH begin -- Ind to HH Flag update dbo.CONSTITUENT set ISGROUP = 1 where ID in (select id from @constituentselection)
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@rowcount
begin try insert into groupdata ( id, grouptypecode,addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged ) select id,0,@changeagentid,@changeagentid,@currentdate,@currentdate from @constituentselection end try begin catch update groupdata set grouptypecode=0,grouptypeid=null, changedbyid=@changeagentid, datechanged=@currentdate where id in (select id from @constituentselection) end catch
--remove first name and name formats delete from nameformat where constituentid in (select id from @constituentselection)
update constituent set firstname='' where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) --
end
if @ACTIONTYPE = 5 --No type change, just remove first name and name formats begin --remove first name and name formats delete from nameformat where constituentid in (select id from @constituentselection)
update constituent set firstname='' where ID in (select id from @constituentselection) -- set @NUMBEREDITED = @@rowcount
end
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
